title: Pork steaks with creamy onion and mushroom sauce
ingredients: ['300ml (1/2 pt) chicken stock', '6 thin pork steaks', '3 carrots', '1 swede', '2 parsnips', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon dried crumbled sage', 'For the sauce', '1 onion, diced', '6 mushrooms, diced', 'oil or butter for frying', '3 tablespoons sherry', '120ml creme faiche', '1 teaspoon paprika', 'ground black pepper, to taste', '1 pinch salt', '2 teaspoons cornflour']
